WHEELIE stood his ground.  Glan=
cing up at the DINOBOT COMMANDER, and the numerous other DINOSAURS who were=
 following him.  "I am Wheelie, and so I said, I would be your friend until=
 we both were dead."

His arms crossed inf ront of him and his energon slin=
gshot holstered at his flank, "I was you friend when I was small, you saved=

owe you a debt.  While we were on the planet of Quintesson, fighting off th=
e wild Sharkticon."

Glancing up at the seemingly rage imbued GRIMLOCK, WHE=

ted upon you, for which I would quake..  Then I will pay the penance for wh=
